meanings: (자격·재능·자질 등을) possess, be equipped (to do); (선천적으로) be endowed with
a man with initiative and drive

vlive.korean: 갖춘 게 뭐지? 아 세팅했냐고? What does that mean? Oh, is it set up? 듣기 View video AB6IX : ㄷㅎ즈 퇴근 동방🚗🌜
vlive.english: What does that mean? Oh, is it set up?

vlive.korean: "잘생긴 외모에 귀여움까지 모두 갖춘 완벽한 사람이 세상에 또 어디 있습니까?" "handsome appearance and cuteness". "Who else is like him"? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [VPICK! 주접특강] INFINITE 김성규 영역🐹 (KIM SUNG KYU reading lovely comments)
vlive.english: "handsome appearance and cuteness". "Who else is like him"?

vlive.korean: [텔레파시 능력도 갖춘 JK] 어떻게 맞힌 거야? [and telepathy power] How did he guess? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.89
vlive.english: [and telepathy power] How did he guess?

vlive.korean: [90년대 감성과 트렌디함을 다 갖춘 이 곡] 여러분 함께 들어볼까요? Shall we hear this together? 듣기 View video Hidden Track No.V : 정세운이 추천하는 가을에 듣기 좋은 노래 #EP 06
처음이지만 제법 모양새를 갖춘 재료들. It's his first time, but the ingredients look pretty good. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [아큐멘터리] 찬란한 MY '웨이' 업텐션 웨이 3부
vlive.english: It's his first time, but the ingredients look pretty good.
